adHeader: MARBLE AND GRANITE Clean, (Resurface/Refinish) Polish and seal
adDetails: RESTORING AND MAINTAINING THE NATURAL BEAUTY OF STONE TOTAL RESTORATION OF MARBLE , GRANITE, LIMESTONE, TRAVERTINE, CLEAN POLISH and SEAL CALL show contact info FOR FREE ESTIMATE We make your stone look new again. ENJOY A NATURAL STONE LOOK WITHOUT REPLACING. We work on the following stones; MARBLE, GRANITE, LIMESTONE, TRAVERTINE, TERRAZZO and SLATES We do the following to make your stone look new again; 1. CLEAN 2. POLISH 3. SPOT REMOVAL 4. SCRATCH REMOVAL 5. STAIN REMOVAL and 6. SEAL. We work on; 1. FLOORS 2. COUNTER TOPS 3. VANITIES 4. TABLE TOPS 5. KITCHENS 6. BATHROOMS 7. SHOWERS 8. ENTRY WAYS 9. FOYERS 10. WALLS. 11. FIRE PLACE We provide easy steps to protect and maintain the new look of your stone. We leave you home clean and dust free. TWENTY YEARS EXPERIENCE IN RESIDENTIAL AND COMMERCIAL AREAS. CALL show contact info for a free estimate. If no one is available please leave your name, phone number and the best time to reach you. We will return your call as soon as possible.
